"Xiera": "Hello! This is the \"Fighter Basics\" training course!"
"When the Gear Gauge of Twin Dagger Gear goes up a stage, <red>Photon Arts become stronger<c>!"
"Let's start with <red>raising the Gear Gauge by two stages<c>."
"Task 1: <yellow>Use a Photon Art after 2 Gear stages.<c>"
"Task 1: <yellow>Use a Photon Art after 2 Gear stages.<c>"

"・Jump using <%Jump> and use <%WeaponAction> to
\u3000raise the gauge by 2 stages
・Follow up by using a Photon
\u3000Art with <%PhotonArts>"

"・Jump using <%Jump> and use <%MainPaletteC> to
\u3000raise the gauge by 2 stages
・Follow up by using a Photon
\u3000Art with <%PhotonArts>"

"By learning the Class Skill \"Twin Dagger Gear\", you can further increase the performance of your Twin Daggers.

The Gear Gauge will rise when you jump or when you use your Weapon Action.

Each stage on the Gear Gauge will boost the power of Photon Arts."
